name: So Much Planes!
description:
Did you see so much planes? (not at all i guess)


That's currently a prototype to test multiplayer mechanics and... to have fun, why not?

Even being a prototype for another project, this took me hours of sleep, and the result was what you saw above. So, if you enjoyed as well as me, share with your friends (not much because the server doesn't support) and play with them!! :D ...aand help me to build a better game!

Any little help/suggestion/commentary/inquiry/crticism/food/scream/nudes and ideas will be

underrated

Just kidding, i'm a nice guy :DDD

So i expect you to be too.. :DD

No pressure. :D

Whats New:
  • Minor bug update;
  • Now you can play with 3 different types of planes;
